mapper.select: SELECT li.career_list_id ,li.major_id, li.prof_id, li.career_list_date, q.career_q_id, q.career_q_content FROM k_career_list li join k_career_q q on li.career_list_id = q.career_list_id

SELECT li.career_list_id ,li.major_id, li.prof_id, li.career_list_date, q.career_q_id, q.career_q_content FROM k_career_list li join k_career_q q on li.career_list_id = q.career_list_id WHERE li.prof_id=#{id}
